title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather and analyze the project requirements for MindMeldSocialNetwork, including user stories, functional requirements, non-functional requirements, and any other relevant specifications.

title: Design MindMeldSocialNetwork Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture for MindMeldSocialNetwork, including frontend, backend, database, security, and any other necessary components.

title: Develop Frontend Components
description: Create the user interface for MindMeldSocialNetwork, including design, implementation, testing, and deployment of frontend components.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services for MindMeldSocialNetwork, including APIs, data storage, and any other necessary functionality.

title: Set Up Database Schema
description: Create and configure the database schema for MindMeldSocialNetwork, including table structure, indexes, and any other necessary database objects.

title: Implement Emotion Detection and Sharing Features
description: Develop and integrate emotion detection and sharing functionality into the MindMeldSocialNetwork application.

title: Perform Security Audit and Implement Measures
description: Conduct a security audit of the MindMeldSocialNetwork application and implement necessary measures to ensure user privacy and data protection.

title: Integration Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform integration testing of the MindMeldSocialNetwork application, including user acceptance testing and any other necessary QA activities.
dependencies: Implement Emotion Detection and Sharing Features

title: Deploy MindMeldSocialNetwork Application
description: Deploy the MindMeldSocialNetwork application to a production environment, ensuring smooth operation and minimal downtime.
dependencies: Perform Security Audit and Implement Measures
